text: Katie Quinn Lowes (born September 22, 1982) is an American actress and theater director. She is best known for her role as Quinn Perkins in Scandal. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American theatre directors Category:Actors from Queens
title: Katie Lowes
